item.title: CVE-2024-32440|2024-04-15T08:04:18.808Z -- thomas%20belser -- asgaros%20forum
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Thomas Belser Asgaros Forum.This issue affects Asgaros Forum: from n/a through 2.8.0.
